title: Goat milk formula biz fronts funds for IPO
text:
Goat milk infant formula business Nuchev is kicking off its investor roadshow, targeting Austalia, New Zealand and Asia.

Sole lead manager and underwriter Wilsons sent a message to fund managers on Wednesday morning with the roadshow details for the approximately $40 million listing.

Nuchev CEO Ben Dingle is no stranger to the infant formula game. Wayne Taylor

The roadshow will kick off in Singapore on Tuesday next week then make its way to Hong Kong. It will blitz Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane and Auckland from Monday, November 11.

The final IPO offer size and valuation won't be set till later next week, fund managers were told.

Nuchev develops, markets and sells goat milk infant formula to consumers in Australia, China and Hong Kong.
description: Goat milk infant formula business Nuchev is kicking off its investor roadshow, targeting Austalia, New Zealand and Asia.
